meanings.definition: Relating to the diagnosis and treatment of mechanical disorders of the musculoskeletal system, especially the spine.
meanings.sent1: The chiropractic approach focuses on treating issues related to the spine and muscles.
meanings.sent2: She visited a chiropractic clinic for her back pain.
meanings.sent3: The chiropractic adjustment made her feel like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent4: His chiropractic care straightened out his back problems.
meanings.sent5: The chiropractic treatment provided relief for her stiff neck.

meanings.definition: A system of complementary medicine based on the diagnosis and manipulative treatment of misalignments of the joints, especially those of the spinal column.
meanings.sent1: Chiropractic focuses on aligning joints for better health.
meanings.sent2: He decided to pursue a career in chiropractic.
meanings.sent3: The chiropractic session felt like a gentle puzzle being solved.
meanings.sent4: Her spine felt like a harmonious melody after the chiropractic adjustment.
meanings.sent5: The chiropractic care provided relief for his persistent back pain.
